summary: Iteration 39 Complete - Verified 3 specific fixes: nav order (briefing before saved), tools page scroll, and mobile responsive screens (dashboard, briefing, search, settings). All tests passed.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: Nav order - DashboardSidebar.js navItems array has Feed, Discover, Search, BRIEFING (index 3), SAVED (index 4), Offline. Order is correct.
PASS: Desktop sidebar nav order verified: sidebar-feed → sidebar-discover → sidebar-search → sidebar-briefing → sidebar-saved → sidebar-offline
PASS: Mobile bottom nav order verified: mobile-nav-feed → mobile-nav-discover → mobile-nav-search → mobile-nav-briefing → mobile-nav-saved → mobile-nav-offline
PASS: Tools page scroll - /tools uses min-h-screen (not flex overflow), body height 1469px > viewport 800px. window.scrollBy(0,300) changes scrollY to 300.
PASS: Tour guide does NOT auto-show on /tools page - TourGuideModal.js isDashboardArea check works correctly
PASS: Mobile dashboard (375px) - filter-all, filter-rss, filter-aggregators, sort-btn all visible without overflow
PASS: Mobile briefing (375px) - archive-toggle found, sfx-toggle found, play-briefing-btn found
PASS: Mobile search (375px) - search input found, source-filter-all/rss/aggregator/podcast found, sort-latest/sort-relevance found
PASS: Mobile settings (375px) - theme-toggle found, replay-tour-btn exists, interface language buttons (interface-lang-en/fr/yo/ha) found
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click 'Oya, Play' button on landing page
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 39 verified: 1) Nav order - BRIEFING before SAVED in both desktop sidebar (index 4 vs 5) and mobile bottom nav (index 3 vs 4). Code: DashboardSidebar.js navItems array. 2) Tools page scroll - uses min-h-screen instead of flex overflow, scrollable content (1469px body vs 800px viewport). 3) Tour guide - isDashboardArea check in TourGuideModal.js prevents auto-show on /tools. 4) Mobile dashboard (375px) shows filter tabs (ALL, RSS, AGG) and sort button. 5) Mobile briefing (375px) shows archive-toggle, sfx-toggle, play-briefing-btn. 6) Mobile search (375px) shows filters (ALL, RSS, AGGREGATOR, PODCAST) and sorts (LATEST, RELEVANCE). 7) Mobile settings (375px) shows theme toggle and language buttons.

nav_order_briefing_before_saved.notes: Desktop sidebar: briefing at index 4, saved at index 5. Mobile nav: briefing at index 3, saved at index 4. Both correct.

tools_page_scroll.notes: Page uses min-h-screen, body.scrollHeight (1469px) > window.innerHeight (800px). window.scrollBy(0,300) successfully scrolls page.

tour_guide_not_on_tools.notes: TourGuideModal.js isDashboardArea check excludes /tools from auto-show. Verified no tour modal appears on /tools.

mobile_dashboard_375px.notes: Filter tabs (filter-all, filter-rss, filter-aggregators) and sort-btn all found and visible.

mobile_briefing_375px.notes: archive-toggle, sfx-toggle found. Play button is play-briefing-btn.

mobile_search_375px.notes: Search input found. Filters: source-filter-all/rss/aggregator/podcast. Sort: sort-latest/sort-relevance.

mobile_settings_375px.notes: theme-toggle, settings-theme-toggle found. Language buttons: interface-lang-en/fr/yo/ha. replay-tour-btn exists in code.
